quote: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: I'd rather take coffee than compliments just now.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Coffee is a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your older self.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Even bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.
author: David Lynch

quote: I don't really like coffee, she said, but I don't really like it when my head hits my desk when I fall asleep either.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.
author: Justina Chen Headley

quote: Police work wouldn't be possible without coffee," Wallander said.
author: Henning Mankell

quote: Want coffee? I asked, as I headed that way.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Come on, don't you ever stop and smell the coffee?
author: Justina Chen Headley

quote: Coffee first. Schemes later.
author: Leanna Renee Hieber

quote: Mercy," he mumbled. "What the hell did you do to my French Roast?
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Only an idiot would rely on the energy of a bean or a leaf to stay awake throughout the day.
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
author: Jean Kerr

quote: Coffee and chocolate—the inventor of mocha should be sainted.
author: Cherise Sinclair

quote: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.
author: Marcia Carrington

quote: What the hell makes you smart?" I asked.
author: Erich Segal

quote: There are three intolerable things in life - cold coffee, lukewarm champagne, and overexcited women...
author: Orson Welles

quote: Just coffee. Black—like my soul.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: No matter what historians claimed, BC really stood for "Before Coffee.
author: Cherise Sinclair

quote: It doesn't matter where you're from - or how you feel... There's always peace in a strong cup of coffee.
author: Gabriel Bá

quote: I like my coffee with cream and my literature with optimism.
author: Abigail Reynolds

quote: This is like a cookie, it tastes like a cookie having sex with a doughnut.
author: Daniel Handler

quote: I brought you some coffee.” he held out the cup but she waved it away.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand-Périgord

quote: The fresh smell of coffee soon wafted through the apartment, the smell that separates night from day.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: He mulled that over. "Sheriff Connally woulda let us shoot 'em."
author: Craig Johnson

quote: Pretending to drink coffee was similar to faking an orgasm.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Right,” Holden said. “No coffee. This is a terrible, terrible planet.
author: James S.A. Corey

quote: You wanna-I dunno-get coffee or something sometime?"
author: David Levithan

quote: American coffee can be a pale solution served at a temperature of 100
author: Umberto Eco

quote: His smile was like a Dylan album and a cup of coffee on a sunny afternoon
author: Jen Archer Wood

quote: Coffee, unless it is very good and made by somebody else, is pretty intolerable at any time.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Looks like I missed a party. Good. I wasn’t really in the mood to off demons this evening. Haven’t had my coffee yet. (Jared)
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: She was made mostly of coffee and empty spaces.
author: Adelise M. Cullens

quote: I never said I liked coffee better than sex. I said I'd had it more.
author: Kevin Sinnott

quote: Somehow, the Good Lord don't want to see no man start a cold morning with just black coffee.
author: Robert Newton Peck

quote: It's over," Keelie said.
author: Becky Cochrane

quote: Good morning, sunshine,” he said, his smile quickly disappearing in the face of her murderous glance when she raised her face to look at him.
author: Alanea Alder

quote: The powers of a man's mind are directly proportioned to the quantity of coffee he drinks.
author: Sir James Mackintosh

quote: Never say no to coffee
author: Cesar

quote: Oh and P.S.? I am in dire need of more coffee. Industrial strength."
author: Susane Colasanti

quote: I decide to turn to my old faithful solution to all that is wrong in life. Coffee.
author: Lisa Renee Jones

quote: There were some problems only coffee and ice cream could fix.
author: Amal El-Mohtar

quote: I don't drink coffee I take tea my dear
author: Sting

quote: I need COFFEE to help me change the things I can... and WINE to help me accept the things I can't!
author: Tanya Masse

quote: Sure some medical experts say coffee could be a health hazard, but they obviously never built a web site before!
author: Geoff Blake

quote: After a geological epoch passed in which single-celled organisms evolved into talk show hosts, Mr. Coffee was still holding out on me.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Tea is certainly as much of a social drink as coffee, and more domestic, for the reason that the teacup hours are the family hours."
author: Arthur Gray

quote: Stencil had called from a Hungarian coffee shop on York Avenue known as Hungarian Coffee Shop
author: Thomas Pynchon

quote: They can kill the Kennedys. Why can't they make a cup of coffee that tastes good?
author: John Swartzwelder

quote: A real prison breakfast" I said.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Whoever had opened that first Starbucks in Seattle should be shot.
author: Virna DePaul

quote: I love that there's such a rivalry. It's like, leaf water versus bean water, ya know? - Charlie
author: Robyn Schneider

quote: What's that?"
author: Jenn Bennett

quote: Coffee is a kind of magic you can drink.
author: Catherynne M. Valente

quote: And, most days she survives on coffee, poetry and love...romancing herself back to life.
author: N.R.Hart

quote: You don't experience life by drinking coffee fast. You experience life by savoring every last drop.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: It's when I sip coffee that I know that I can handle anything that life can throw at me.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: A cup of gourmet coffee shared with a friend is happiness tasted and time well spent.
author: Unknown Author

quote: I need to espresso love by whatever beans necessary.
author: Anyta Sunday

quote: Most people think coffee is what wakes you up in the morning. I believe it’s actually brushing your teeth with hand lotion instead of toothpaste.
author: Khloe Beutler

quote: I don't just sip my coffee.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Sometimes success is simply being able to drink an entire cup of coffee while it's still hot.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: It's when the coffee keeps coming, that I keep drinking.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Coffee became one of life's necessities when love was invented.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Cappuccino is sex in a cup.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: When hands are in love, coffee will always come to the rescue.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Nothing says, "You're a man!" more than coffee & cake.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Iced coffee might be cold, but it was made in heaven.
author: Anthony T. Hincks.

quote: Think of me lying
author: Hanna Abi Akl

quote: He had to find her.
author: Jennifer Egan

quote: Coffee is liquid cigarette.
author: Bryanna Reid

quote: I signed over my entire business for the sum of ten pounds and a gorilla-shaped hat. It would have been twenty pounds but I really wanted that hat.
author: Annabel Townsend

quote: Her coffee is getting cold as she waits for him to miss her, while his cigarettes are running one after another, trying to forget her.
author: Unknown

quote: Hot coffee and cold winter mornings are two of the best soul mates who ever did find each other.
author: Terri Guillemets

quote: A little coffee. A little sunlight. Your troubles will get smaller.
author: Richard Webber

quote: if he was
author: Amanda Lovelace

quote: Aw, coffee, no.
author: Matt Fraction

quote: Through drowsiness, your body is telling you that you need to rest. By drinking a caffeinated drink, you are telling it to go to hell.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Your life will always be better off when you concentrate on the simplest joys of life like drinking a cup of coffee!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: My mom is a black-no-sugar woman, but I basically believe in turning my coffee into cheesecake.
author: Jordan Weisman

quote: A great cup of coffee in the morning, makes the tiger in me behave like a real gentleman.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: A coffee in the morning will turn the most timid of a man into a tiger for the rest of the day.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: He eyed her warily. “Did Pearl give you coffee?
author: Katie Cross

quote: Although excessive coffee drinking may cause you to die earlier, you'll get more done before you do.
author: Jimvirle/Jinvirle

quote: Drinking coffee with your ex is healthy. It's good for the soul.
author: Leju Thomas

quote: Even a teapot craves a Starbucks café latte.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: They were obviously all feeling a bit jumpy. The coffee probably didn’t help, although some of them swore they needed it. Craved it was more like it.
author: Jason Medina

quote: If you love life, you'll love this.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Without the pieces there can be no whole and without the whole the pieces have no place. What the hell does that mean?
author: Bryan Oftedahl

quote: Did you just do that math in your head?" Farkas asked the admiral.
author: Kirsten Beyer

quote: Because of their lack of originality, women who say that they like their men like they like their coffee turn off even men who are black and strong.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Kate wondered who was more addicted to their high, serial killers or coffee addicts.
author: Victoria Schwab

quote: You smoked another cigarette and we shared another coffee and it was just another morning that made me realise that this is all it takes to be happy.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Never underestimate the power of a good cup of coffee.
author: Ursula Vernon

quote: Coffee and books are a simple recipe for happiness.
author: Nourhan Mamdouh

quote: Waking up, for many people, is apparently a positive experience. There are twittering birds and the smell of fresh coffee fills the air.
author: Amy Petrie Shaw

quote: I'm not everyone's cup of tea, because I'm a kick butt cappuccino with extra milk fluff and chocolate sprinkles!
author: Jennifer White - Strong Heart Awakening

quote: Only coffee can show up late.
author: Awatef Abdulaziz

quote: Coffee, tea or me?
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Ah the dreams of being a writer… They always smell of old research books and several cups of coffee.
author: Laís Queiroz

quote: It tastes of the most bitter poison . . I've never tasted something so disgusting." - Mark Blackthorn
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: No milk. It is black coffee, pure but strong, that fortifies against the powers of darkness with which the world is filled.
author: Robert Aickman

quote: It was as if the air was fragranced with potential and the coffee flavoured with facts.
author: Elise K. Ackers

quote: The pull of lingering dreams,
author: Vijaya Gowrisankar

quote: I get into beatific cornucopia when I delve into books, coffee, and wanderings!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Maybe those verses in Ezekiel about the dry bones coming back to life were actually a prophecy in reference to caffeine.
author: Erynn Mangum

quote: Nothing like a hot cup of black filtered coffee, none of that fancy espresso crap. Especially from those new pod machines. What is this, a spaceship?
author: Caspar Vega

quote: I can’t deal with angry people until after I’ve had my morning coffee.
author: Henning Mankell

quote: I think much of a #writerslife is figuring out how much coffee is needed to fuel madness & creativity while avoiding having to pee.
author: Jennifer Worrell

quote: State: 'It's a pleasure to be here' and offer a cup of coffee.
author: Business English Magazine Poznań

quote: I'm going to buy you coffee and you're going to pretend it's truth serum and tell me
author: Victoria Denault

quote: If I wanted to consume something that looks and tastes like dirt, I’d eat dirt,” I said, “at least dirt isn’t overpriced."
author: Garrison Kelly

quote: I have never been drawn to luxury. I love the simple things; coffee shops, books, and people who try to understand.
author: R. YS Perez

quote: Coffee first. Save the world later.
author: Caroline George

quote: At this point, caffeine wasn't for pleasure, it was sheer survival.
author: Stormy Smith

quote: Oh yes! I have couple-goals too. I love to couple myself with- Books, Coffee and Mountains.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: You taste like the last drop of whiskey
author: Malak El Halabi

quote: She tasted of coffee and day old poetry.
author: R. YS Perez

quote: Coffee and love taste the same, bittersweet!
author: Saravana Kumar Murugan

quote: If a boy can manage to have coffee with me during the apocalypse, I know he cares. There’s not a speck of doubt in my mind. He must care.
author: Caroline George

quote: I should never do anything pre-coffee.
author: Cindy Brown

quote: Two dreams and a cup of coffee later.
author: F.K. Preston

quote: Just fuck me up.
author: Julie Johnson

quote: The highway behind gives me courage to move into the future. I desire to see the first light of tomorrow.
author: John E. Quinlan

quote: Our surroundings fade and we exist in unison, two people who once shared cups of coffee, unprecedentedly ourselves in a changing world.
author: Caroline George

quote: This is the last time we have breakfast together:
author: Malak El Halabi

quote: The coffee is not strong enough to keep me awake.
author: J. Limbu

quote: Only two kinds of people drink their coffee black: cops and serial killers.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: Life isn't sugarcoated. Why should coffee be?
author: Tommy Wallach

quote: …he quit drinking coffee, and naturally, his brain stopped working.
author: Orhan Pamuk

quote: Jack and Stephen were neither of them human until the first pot of coffee was down, hot and strong.
author: Patrick O'Brian

quote: Rested, shaved, coffee’d, steaked, you will be a different man.
author: Patrick O'Brian

quote: I should've suspected trouble when the coffee failed to arrive.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Love doesn't go away overnight. It sometimes stays for coffee.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: She was an ocean, confined in a coffee mug. And she had the galaxies, confined in her pretty eyes.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: Coffee and makeup would reach its limit and no longer work in hiding my sleeplessness.
author: Mandy Nachampassack-Maloney

quote: I have measured out my life with coffee spoons
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Prayer is like coffee for my soul in the morning
author: Munia Khan

quote: I have a strong theory that you can tell a lot about someone by their coffee order..
author: Emmie Lee Dean

quote: I have a strong theory that you can tell a lot about someone by their coffee order.
author: Emmie Lee Dean

quote: Writing is like my coffee. If I don't have any, I go crazy.
author: Khali Raymond

quote: No coffee, no way.
author: Toba Beta

quote: C is for coffee. Coffee would always be there for her.
author: Cassandra O'Leary

quote: He asked her for coffee, but she wanted tea instead.
author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quote: Let me wake up next to you,
author: Deepa Borkar

quote: She lifted the cup to her lips. “You make good coffee.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: I have a strong theory that you can tell a lot about someone by their coffee order
author: Emmie Lee Dean

quote: I stood in your doorway this morning
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Don't ever let anyone tell you that fairy tales aren't real. I drink a potion made from magic beans every day, and it brings me back to life.
author: Nanea Hoffman

quote: There's no mistaking what kind of potion I need. Caffeine - for alertness and rejuvenation.
author: Amy Alward

quote: Cup of Joe
author: Bo Burnham

quote: There's no feeling in this world like writing in the attic on a snowy day and the smell of coffee brewing
author: Charmaine J.Forde

quote: Fucking Hell! I just want a coffee.
author: Matilda When

quote: * Location: Break room.
author: Qwen Slasbury

quote: They lingered over cups of ersatz coffee.
author: Leon Uris

quote: Just kick ass, chew bubble gum, and drink black coffee.
author: Christopher  Josephs

quote: Oscar Wilde may have quipped that one can “never be overdressed or overeducated,” but Wilde did not live in our era of overeducated baristas.
author: Usman W. Chohan

quote: There's coffee for those who want it,' the Duke said.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: You’d have coffee on a drip if you could, wouldn’t you?
author: Kristina Adams

quote: There are a few rules in investigations, and one is to never cringe at the person’s appearance that you’re about to pump for info.
author: Ruth Bainbridge

quote: You can tell the number of hours spent on a work by counting the number of coffee rings on your desk.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Your fancy alien train is broken?"
author: James S.A. Corey

quote: Anhil's coffee was hot, dark, full-flavored, perfect chasing the equally well-turned donut: golden brown, dense without being leaden, not too sweet.
author: A.M. Homes

quote: And you became like the coffee,
author: Mahmoud Darwish

quote: Good. Coffee is good for you. It's the caffeine in it. Caffeine, we are here. Caffeine puts a man on her horse and a woman in his grave.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: alone, drinking coffee, listening to the playlist that include the songs that remember you with the best and bad moments of your life.
author: Nabil TOUSSI

quote: The problem is NOT the PROBLEM...The problem is I haven’t had enough COFFEE to deal with the PROBLEM.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: An aroma more heavenly than a flight of angels trickled on the breeze. "Coffee!" He breathed the word like a prayer.
author: Karen Kincy

quote: Isn't the smell of coffee the best alarm clock?
author: S.A. Tawks

quote: When your blood runs black as the blackest night and your heart sounds as the warriors’ march, only then may you say, “I’ve had enough coffee.
author: Death Wish Coffee co.

quote: Don't stir all the warmth out of your coffee; drink it.
author: Kate Chopin

quote: Anyone who started a quarrel had to atone for it by buying a dish of coffee for everyone present.
author: Tom Standage

quote: Thanks for going in with me,” I told her.
author: Andrea Heltsley

quote: There's an awful lot of coffee in the air, and a lot of awful coffee, too!
author: John Simmons

quote: It turned out people truly did cry into their coffee cups.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: What's a rainy day
author: Sanober Khan

quote: I went out the kitchen to make coffee - yards of coffee. Rich, strong, bitter, boiling hot, ruthless, depraved. The life blood of tired men.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: I'll share my life with you. But, not my doughnuts.
author: Crystal Woods

quote: some poems froth
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Love is blind. Especially in the morning, because I can't see a damn thing before having coffee.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quote: COFFEE! Because this body is NOT going to wake itself up!
author: Comic Strip Mama

quote: What doesn’t KILL me makes me stronger… Except for the extinction of COFFEE… that might kill me.
author: Tanya Masse

quote: Where do you get inspiration for your books?
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I have only two wishes," said Jean. "The first is for strong coffee, and the second is for stronger coffee.
author: Scott Lynch

quote: Denial, anger, bargaining, depression, COFFEE and acceptance…The SIX stages of waking up!!
author: Comic Strip Mama

quote: Cheri grinned cockily at Pam and turned to Chelsea. “I figure my coffee won’t have time to get cold before this is over.
author: C.B. Cook

quote: At this time to refuse or neglect to give coffee to their wives was a legitimate cause for divorce among the Turks." William H. Ukers (1873-1945).
author: Stewart Lee Allen

quote: Follow the ideal doing,
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Asking me to do ANYTHING before I’ve had my first cup of coffee should be an episode on 1000 Ways to DIE.
author: Comic Strip Mama

quote: For dinner I had 20 ounces of coffee and 5 Kraft singles. Am I going to die?
author: Judy Greer

quote: Coffee is not about having something to drink in cool weather, it's about having something to drink when you are not sleeping
author: Bobby Darnell

quote: Drink your coffee, it clears out the brain in the morning
author: Sergei Lukyanenko

quote: I wear the universe backwards.
author: D. Antoinette Foy

quote: Coffee is a girl who never tells a boy no.
author: Andrew  Smith

quote: I don’t see the point in caffeine without coffee. Or coffee without caffeine, for that matter,” I informed him.
author: Robyn Schneider

quote: Coffee and chocolate are certainly wonderful, but they must forever carry tea’s silken train, ever the bridesmaids and never the bride.
author: Paul Kortepeter

quote: I am not addicted to coffee, it find it's way every morning.
author: Pushpa Rana

quote: I surround myself with books when I write, thus surrounding myself with writers... only they don't critique me and then get up for coffee.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: I don’t see the point in caffeine without coffee. Or coffee without caffeine, for that matter.
author: Robyn Schneider

quote: All the best days start with a latte and a time trip.
author: P.K. Hrezo

quote: If this is decaf, I'm going to pour it on your head.
author: Audrey Bell

quote: The coffee will help with post-resurrection synapse realignment. Trust me.
author: Adam Christopher

quote: I ordered a single espresso because I wanted a drink I could hook up with.
author: Randy Kagan

quote: These days, “getting lucky” means drinking an entire cup of COFFEE while it’s still HOT!
author: Comic Strip Mama

quote: Till such time that there are strong men in this world, a woman would prefer strong coffee!
author: Manoj Vaz

quote: Some of the world's most effective thoughts happen over a brew of morning's coffee
author: Prabhukrishna M

quote: He looked down at my cup and his little, bony fingers started crawling towards it.
author: Tia Artemis

quote: Taking away coffee from Americans is like taking away oil from the motors.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: Coffee! Coffee!
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: We look up to see if it is day or night.
author: Roman Payne

quote: It's the fine balance of caffeine and alcohol that bookends my days
author: Tim Minchin

quote: No! I'm not ready, this is still my first cup of coffee!
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: First dentistry was painless.
author: Arthur Guiterman

quote: Put the coffee on, bubbles, I'm coming home
author: Richard Brautigan

quote: A silent yawn is a scream for coffee
author: T. Haque

quote: Pause while reading a book only in case of two things:
author: Saleem Sharma

quote: Our culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: If coffee were like dreams, then I would be wired in constant bliss, never needing sleep to live out my dreams.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: 'Venti caramel macchiato, please,' he said. 'Hold the snobbery.'
author: S.W. Vaughn

quote: I’d like to THANK whoever saw a
author: Comic Strip Mama

quote: It's a five pots of liquid sleep kind of morning.
author: Michelle M. Pillow

quote: Uh, puedo hablar con Andrew Nelson, por favor?" I asked, feeling like an idiot.
author: Kate Klise

quote: Then everyone would retreat for a nap, after which we would have coffee and cake, sometimes an argument.
author: Aleksandar Hemon

quote: It's mechanical," Leo said. "Maybe a doorway to the dwarfs' secret lair?"
author: Rick Riordan

quote: That's something that annoys the hell out of me- I mean if somebody says the coffee's all ready and it isn't
author: J.D. Salinger

quote: Is there any time in your life when you do not feel the need for caffeine?"
author: Seanan McGuire

quote: Life is like coffee, the darker it gets, the more it energizes.
author: Ankita Singhal

quote: I hereby arm myself for today with coffee and the willingness to be wrong.
author: Audrey Assad

quote: Always choose the adventure ... unless, it's chilly outside and there's a cup of warm coffee resting near a book and comfy sofa.
author: Barbara Brooke

quote: She put her cup down and sighed again with pleasure. "I can't think how the Nonconformists have failed to discover coffee."
author: Josephine Tey

quote: Sometimes, they just make coffee cups too small.
author: Michelle M. Pillow

quote: The best thing about being a writer is that 'work' is always something you love, plus usually accompanied by tea, coffee and cakes of some sort.
author: Jamie L. Harding

quote: Endure for another day, Mister Tannen, and you'll have all the foul black misuse of water you can drink.
author: Scott Lynch

quote: Kate picked up her coffee cup, frowning when she saw it was empty. "Did you drink my coffee?"
author: Jennifer Crusie

quote: Getting shot was an experience that Elise ranked on the “unpleasantness” scale right around “trying to survive a week without coffee.
author: S.M. Reine

quote: Chris, soap people are like
author: V.C. Andrews

quote: We're growing up and I don't like it," said Tacy, as they say at Heinz's later, drinking coffee.
author: Maud Hart Lovelace

quote: The coffee's done? I LOVE IT WHEN THE COFFEE'S DONE!
author: Craig Benzine

quote: With full mugs and expectant hearts-
author: Eric Samuel Timm

quote: Coffee,' Walker said over me. 'Now.
author: Kristen Ashley

quote: Katherine screwed her nose up at the taste of the instant coffee.
author: Patti Roberts

quote: Coffee and character designs: That's what my night's lookin' like.
author: Tyler Hojberg

quote: I like coffee exceedingly...
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: A smoke, a book, a cup of coffee.
author: R.M. Engelhardt

quote: We drank our coffee the Russian way. That is to say we had vodka before it and vodka afterwards.
author: Philip Sington

quote: How are you feeling?"
author: Tiffany Reisz

quote: The only time I drink milk is when I drink coffee. I make love the same way—contributing 2% as I just sort of lay there.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: People like to cry over spilled milk, but I cry every time I spill my coffee.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Many people claim coffee inspires them, but, as everybody knows, coffee only makes boring people even more boring.
author: Balzac

quote: A companion on a caffeine high will wake me up just as well, without the aftertaste.
author: Jodi Meadows

quote: I don't know how you drink this straight. You're badass."
author: Andrea Cremer

quote: Coffee is a warm drink that fosters friendship and tastes great. What more is there to life?
author: Kevin Sinnott

quote: The perfectly measured burr of a dispassionate detective had suddenly changed into the explosive boom of a take-no-shit street cop.
author: Cleo Coyle

quote: I'll know coffee works without cream and sugar when I see people buying unsweetened bakers chocolate for Valentine's Day.
author: Kevin Sinnott

quote: Writing Cave means it's Coffee O'Clock...Who am I kidding? It's always Coffee O'Clock!
author: Tammy-Louise Wilkins

quote: I'm a coffee expert. I'm not a medical expert, but I play one on TV. - on Oprah Winfrey interview
author: Kevin Sinnott

quote: You need some coffee, don't you?"
author: John Grisham

quote: We look up to see if it is day or night. If stars burn cool and moon does shine, we take to smoke divine and wine.
author: Roman Payne

quote: Tobacco, coffee, alcohol, hashish, prussic acid, strychnine, are weak dilutions. The surest poison is time.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I need coffee to deal with this, and I’m not getting decaf.
author: Matthew Arnold Stern
